channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins JAPEX Plugin

item.title: CVE-2022-45400|2024-08-03T14:09:57.035Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20japex%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins JAPEX Plugin 1.7 and earlier does not configure its XML parser to prevent XML external entity (XXE) attacks.
